sect2.title: Exporting TSVN Settings
sect2.para: If you want to export all your client settings to use on another computer you can do so using the Windows registry editor regedt32.exe. Go to the registry key HKCU\Software\TortoiseSVN and export it to a reg file. On the other computer, just import that file again (usually, a doubleclick on the reg file will do that).
Remember to save your Subversion settings too, located in the svn config file in %APPDATA%\Subversion.
